title: Israel Reports First Polio Case in Decades
sub_head: Unvaccinated child contracted highly transmissible virus; last reported cases were in 1980s
body:
Israeli health authorities have identified the countryâ€™s first case of polio in decades.
The highly transmissible virus was contracted by an unvaccinated child, the Israel Ministry of Health said Sunday. The Jerusalem District Health Bureau launched an investigation into the case, the ministry said.
